name: Lets Talk Golf Design
description:
Made for  LTGD 2022 Game Jam ,Theme - "There isn't one!"

In this relaxing golf game you need complete 5 levels.If you can complete them in order,then,and only then,you will know THE SECRET! Also you will be accompanied with broken english commentary from delevoper of this game.Such value!

Good luck golfer,you will need it...

Ok,this is my second game jam.I pretty tired after previous one,But cuz this jam was hosted by one of my beloved game design channels and he have hit a milestone 10k subs - well,i cant resist.Game was made in 3-4 days,but i have been really busy with my own stuff in this period.I hope you like my little simple "relaxing" game.

Dont forget to rate game!

Controls - Aim and swing with a mouse

R - reset ball to last checkpoint position.BACKSPACE - return to level select menu

M - mute a VOICE (if he getting annoying)
